answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Jacob, 
I found a few resources for you that will aid you in creating an economic development incentive program. They are listed below and  hopefully other local government officials will be able to chime in with their advice and expertise. 
-Data Innovation and Economic Development Incentives is a blog post that discusses a strategy for creating successful, community specific economic development incentives. http://icma.org/en/results/sustainable_communities/resources/blogpost/2078/Data_Innovation_and_Economic_Development_Incentives
-State of the Art Measures in Economic Development is an article from PM magazine that shows the most innovative best practices in economic development strategies. http://webapps.icma.org/pm/9305/public/cover.cfm?author=David%20Ammons%20and%20Jonathan%20Morgan&title=State-of-the-Art%20Measures%20in%20Economic%20Development&subtitle
-You can read about Colorado's innovative incentive program and how they are attracting businesses. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/302858/Commerce_City_Colorados_Innovative_Incentive_Program
-Learn how public and private organizations can come together to create a more sustainable economic development climate icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/303716
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org


Hi Jacob, 

I found a few resources for you that will aid you in creating an economic development incentive program. They are listed below and  hopefully other local government officials will be able to chime in with their advice and expertise. 

-Data Innovation and Economic Development Incentives is a blog post that discusses a strategy for creating successful, community specific economic development incentives. http://icma.org/en/results/sustainable_communities/resources/blogpost/2078/Data_Innovation_and_Economic_Development_Incentives
-State of the Art Measures in Economic Development is an article from PM magazine that shows the most innovative best practices in economic development strategies. http://webapps.icma.org/pm/9305/public/cover.cfm?author=David%20Ammons%20and%20Jonathan%20Morgan&title=State-of-the-Art%20Measures%20in%20Economic%20Development&subtitle
-You can read about Colorado's innovative incentive program and how they are attracting businesses. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/302858/Commerce_City_Colorados_Innovative_Incentive_Program
-Learn how public and private organizations can come together to create a more sustainable economic development climate icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/303716

Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Jacob Meshke
text: Are any member communities working on or have an innovative economic development incentive/program they'd like to share information about?
title: Local Economic Development Programs/Incentives
